arStrings.szText:
You are inside the Fields of Hatred! Those who are {c_highlight}Bloodmarked{/c} may attack or be attacked by any other Players in the area. You can {c_highlight}Mark for Blood{/c} through the Action Wheel {hotkey:Social_Wheel} .

You cannot Mount while being attacked by other players.

Killing another player:
{c_yellow}Drops their Seeds of Hatred
Heals you for [{SF_6}*100|%|] Missing Life
Reduces your Cooldowns by {SF_7} Seconds{/c}
